title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 28, 2020
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 28, 2020 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Esolangs
items.content_text:
### Languages

*   [C Flat (⭐28)](https://github.com/NicksterSand/Cflat) - Musical language focused on sound rather than notation with creative freedom in mind.
items.content_html:
Languages

  • C Flat (⭐28) - Musical language focused on sound rather than notation with creative freedom in mind.

items.title: Awesome Mqtt
items.content_text:
### Community Resources

*   [MQTT community wiki (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/mqtt/mqtt.org/wiki).

### Broker

*   [Ably](https://www.ably.io/documentation/mqtt) - MQTT broker service and protocol adapter

### Cloud

*   [HiveMQ Cloud](https://www.hivemq.com/cloud/) - HiveMQ Cloud is a fully managed MQTT platform that connects IoT devices to any IoT cloud platform. A cloud native IoT messaging platform that simplifies reliable and scalable IoT device connectivity.

### Tools

*   [mqtt\_recorder (⭐31)](https://github.com/rpdswtk/mqtt_recorder) - Simple cli tool for recording and replaying MQTT messages.

### Makers

*   [deskmate (⭐68)](https://github.com/rbaron/deskmate) - A hackable & portable MQTT-powered mini dashboard and control center.

### Makers / ESP

*   [mqtt-ir-transceiver (⭐145)](https://github.com/piotrC4/mqtt-ir-transceiver) - ESP8266 based bidirectional gateway between MQTT and IR. Use with PlatformIO.

### Smart Home Hardware Interfaces / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

*   [aqara2mqtt (⭐6)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/aqara2mqtt) - Attach [Aqara](http://www.aqara.com.cn/us/index.html) Smart Hubs to MQTT.
items.content_html:
Community Resources

  • MQTT community wiki (⭐5.1k).

Broker

  • Ably - MQTT broker service and protocol adapter

Cloud

  • HiveMQ Cloud - HiveMQ Cloud is a fully managed MQTT platform that connects IoT devices to any IoT cloud platform. A cloud native IoT messaging platform that simplifies reliable and scalable IoT device connectivity.

Tools

  • mqtt_recorder (⭐31) - Simple cli tool for recording and replaying MQTT messages.

Makers

  • deskmate (⭐68) - A hackable & portable MQTT-powered mini dashboard and control center.

Makers / ESP

  • mqtt-ir-transceiver (⭐145) - ESP8266 based bidirectional gateway between MQTT and IR. Use with PlatformIO.

Smart Home Hardware Interfaces / Firmwares for ESP based Devices

  • aqara2mqtt (⭐6) - Attach Aqara Smart Hubs to MQTT.

items.title: Awesome Jax
items.content_text: ### Libraries / New Libraries * [jax-flows (⭐286)](https://github.com/ChrisWaites/jax-flows) - Normalizing flows in JAX. * [sklearn-jax-kernels (⭐43)](https://github.com/ExpectationMax/sklearn-jax-kernels) - `scikit-learn` kernel matrices using JAX. * [efax (⭐72)](https://github.com/NeilGirdhar/efax) - Exponential Families in JAX. ### Models and Projects / JAX * [kalman-jax (⭐100)](https://github.com/AaltoML/kalman-jax) - Approximate inference for Markov (i.e., temporal) Gaussian processes using iterated Kalman filtering and smoothing. * [jaxns (⭐187)](https://github.com/Joshuaalbert/jaxns) - Nested sampling in JAX.
items.content_html:
Libraries / New Libraries

  • jax-flows (⭐286) - Normalizing flows in JAX.
  • sklearn-jax-kernels (⭐43) - scikit-learn kernel matrices using JAX.
  • efax (⭐72) - Exponential Families in JAX.

Models and Projects / JAX

  • kalman-jax (⭐100) - Approximate inference for Markov (i.e., temporal) Gaussian processes using iterated Kalman filtering and smoothing.
  • jaxns (⭐187) - Nested sampling in JAX.

items.title: Awesome AutoHotkey
items.content_text:
### AutoHotkey_H / Web

*   [AutoHotkey\_H](https://hotkeyit.github.io/v2/) - AHK\_H adds functionality to original AutoHotkey and offers true multi-threading using NewThread() function or AutoHotkey.dll. [Full list of v1 changes](https://hotkeyit.github.io/v1/docs/AutoHotkey.htm) + [Full list of v2 changes](https://hotkeyit.github.io/v2/docs/AutoHotkey.htm)
items.content_html:
AutoHotkey_H / Web

  • AutoHotkey_H - AHK_H adds functionality to original AutoHotkey and offers true multi-threading using NewThread() function or AutoHotkey.dll. Full list of v1 changes + Full list of v2 changes

items.title: Awesome Python Scientific Audio
items.content_text:
### Tutorials / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

*   [Live-coding a music synthesizer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SSyQ0kRHzis) Live-coding video showing how to use the SoundDevice library to reproduce realistic sounds. [Code (⭐18)](https://github.com/cool-RR/python_synthesizer).
items.content_html:
Tutorials / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • Live-coding a music synthesizer Live-coding video showing how to use the SoundDevice library to reproduce realistic sounds. Code (⭐18).

items.title: Awesome Plotters
items.content_text:
### Software / Vector Creation

*   [PlotterFun](https://mitxela.com/plotterfun/) - Browser-based Image to SVG converter similar to SquiggleDraw.

### Software / Fonts

*   [CNC Text Tool](https://msurguy.github.io/cnc-text-tool/) - Browser-based Hershey Text tool with export to SVG.

### Community / Patents

*   [PlotterFiles](https://plotterfiles.com/) - Community for sharing SVG files for plotters.

### Other Awesomes / Patents

*   [awesome-3d-engines-for-plotters (⭐90)](https://github.com/msurguy/awesome-3d-engines-for-plotters)
items.content_html:
Software / Vector Creation

  • PlotterFun - Browser-based Image to SVG converter similar to SquiggleDraw.

Software / Fonts

  • CNC Text Tool - Browser-based Hershey Text tool with export to SVG.

Community / Patents

  • PlotterFiles - Community for sharing SVG files for plotters.

Other Awesomes / Patents
